work-item.field:
Actions may be configured to trigger some system function, like manage approvals at  Work Items AND
document level.
A link can then be done between Documents and Work Items Workflow

With InvokeAction, Workflow transition is executed on all Work Items contained in the (filtered) Document.
  • On SendToReview document Workflow action, the contained Work Items ( type:requirement) with status Draft are transitioned through Work Item Review action to InReview status
